characters.name: Walter White
characters.quote: I am the one who knocks!

characters.name: Jesse Pinkman
characters.quote: Yeah science!

characters.name: Skyler White
characters.quote: We've come this far... what's one more?

characters.name: Hank Schrader
characters.quote: It's easy money - 'til we catch you.

characters.name: Marie Schrader
characters.quote: Pain is weakness leaving your body.

characters.name: Walter White Jr.
characters.quote: Do I look like a skater?

characters.name: Gustavo Fring
occupation: Los Pollos Hermanos co-founder and entrepreneur
characters.quote: Never make the same mistake twice.

characters.name: Saul Goodman
characters.quote: Don't drink and drive, but when you do, call Saul.

characters.name: Lydia Rodarte-Quayle
characters.quote: Is it done? Is he gone?

characters.name: Todd Alquist
characters.quote: Just so you know, this isn't personal.

characters.name: Steven Gomez
characters.quote: Yeah, yeah. I'm glad to see you still have your twisted sense of humor.

characters.name: Skinny Pete
characters.quote: The whole thing feels kinda shady, morality-wise.

characters.name: Ted Beneke
characters.quote: Huell? Who's Huell?

characters.name: Brandon Mayhew
characters.quote: Hey dude, are these bullet holes?

characters.name: Huell Babineaux
characters.quote: You're a lawyer. You make good money, right?

characters.name: George Merkert
characters.quote: Know why sharks are at the top of the food chain, Hank?

characters.name: Tyrus Kitt
characters.quote: Gotta make it look real.

characters.name: Andrea Cantillo
characters.quote: You gonna come in my house and judge me?

characters.name: Carmen Molina
characters.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.

characters.name: Jane Margolis
characters.quote: Aww, that was so sweet, I think I threw up in my mouth a little bit.

characters.name: Hector Salamanca
characters.quote: La familia es todo (Family is all).

characters.name: Gale Boetticher
characters.quote: At least with me, they're getting exactly what they pay for.

characters.name: Jack Welker
characters.quote: You want us to do this job? Do it right? That's the price.

characters.name: Kenny
characters.quote: He's a rat. That's all you need to know.

characters.name: Leonel Salamanca
characters.quote: Finish him.

characters.name: Juan Bolsa
characters.quote: I'll weather this, I always do.

characters.name: Pamela Orbic
characters.quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.

quotes.quote: Sometimes it just feels better not to talk. At All. About Anything. To Anyone.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: I’m not saying it’s not bad. It’s bad. But it could be worse.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: You don’t want a criminal lawyer. You want a criminal lawyer.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: No more half-measures, Walter.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: Some people are immune to good advice.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Since when do vegans eat fried chicken?
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: Did you know that there's an acceptable level of rat turds that can go into candy bars? It's the government, jack. Even government doesn't care that much about quality. You know what is okay to put in hot dogs? Huh? Pig lips and *beep* But I say, hey, have at it bitches 'cause I love hot dogs.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Clearly, his taste in women is the same as his taste in lawyers.
quotes.author: Saul Goodman

quotes.quote: We're done when I say we're done.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: The one that says if I can't kill you, you'll sure as *beep* wish you were dead.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: All I can do is wait... for the cancer to come back.
quotes.author: Skyler White

quotes.quote: May his death satisfy you.
quotes.author: Gustavo Fring

quotes.quote: What I came to realise is that fear, that's the worst of it. That's the real enemy. So, get up, get out in the real world and you kick that bastard as hard you can right in the teeth.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Everyone sounds like Meryl Streep with a gun to their head.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: The thing is, if you just do stuff and nothing happens, what's it all mean? What's the point? Oh right, this whole thing is about self-acceptance.
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Did you just bring a bomb into a hospital?
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: You little bastard.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: You need to stop focusing on the darkness behind you. The past is the past. Nothing can change what we’ve done.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: My name is ASAC Schrader, and you can go f*ck yourself.
quotes.author: Hank Schrader

quotes.quote: I am not in danger, Skyler. I AM the danger!
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Keys, scumbag. It's the universal symbol for keys.
quotes.author: Mike Ehrmantraut

quotes.quote: Fire in the hole, bitch!
quotes.author: Jesse Pinkman

quotes.quote: Jesus! Just grow some fucking balls!
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Don't bullshit a bullshitter.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Stop acting like such a baby.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: If that’s true, if you don’t know who I am, then maybe your best course… would be to tread lightly.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Someone has to protect this family from the man who protects this family.
quotes.author: Skyler White

quotes.quote: Then why don't you just frickin die, already?
quotes.author: Walter White Jr

quotes.quote: The Universe is Random. Not Inevitable. It's simple Chaos.
quotes.author: Walter White

quotes.quote: Walter Jr., you're my big man. There are going to be some things that you'll come to learn about me in the next few days. But just know that no matter how it may look, I only had you in my heart. Goodbye!
quotes.author: Walter White
